list.title: Jr. Full Stack Developer in Solaris Development, Martico Group
list.description:
This was my first professional experience in a software company. I work here as a full stack developer mainly in a big project they've been developing for four years now. Here I do everything needed to get things done, this includes:
changes in the mySQL DB (modify and create tables, modify and create Views, etc)
changhes in the backend (modify and create endpoints, very complex controllers that process a lot of information, etc)
changes in the client (they dont have UX designers so this includes designing and developing the hole new functionallitys, and even sometimes meetings with the client)

list.title: Freelance Full Stack Developer
list.description: During this period I waroked in a three programers team in an interesting project for a client. Client was a shoes retailer with three fisical stores in different locations, so he wanted to manage stocks and sales with one system, integrating all the information. I worked mainly in React developing the client-side. I left that project to take my possition in Solaris Development.

list.title: Student in Rolling Code School
list.description: I took this time to learn the bases to start my new career as a developer. In this course I made my first steps in this world and it fascinated me from the very start.

list.title: Maintenance Manager Engineer in Siempre Verde S.A.
list.description: I had diferent positions and responsabilities in the same company trhow these more than 5 years. As all the details are not relevant for my new ocupation (software devloper) I can sum up this experience saying that was incredibly enriching, with sacriifice, mistakes and achievements, and big resposibilities that ibnvolved considerable ammounts of profits and costs for the company. Here I learned a lot about team working and team leading. (If you want to see more details about these years check out my LinkedIn profile)

list.title: Engineering Intern in AB InBev, Quilmes Beer Brewing Company
list.description: This was my firts proffessional experience, I was near to finish my Engineer studies and this was my internship.
